title: What is the circumference of a circle with a radius of 3? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the circumference of a circle with a radius of 3? The circumference of a circle is C = 2*pi*r, so C = 2*pi*3 = 6pi is the exact answer. To get a single number we have to use an approximate value of pi. 3.14 is usually close enough, so 6pi = 18.84 units.
